data.expected_result: Red box should show actual no of unread mantion or 9+
data.short_description: Notification no. Not showing for more then 9 notification
data.steps_to_repro: - Have less then 9 notification till then you can see total no of notification on top left corner - Now as soon as those total notification goes over 9 you can't see no. Of notification just empty red box instead
